data.name: Roxe Cash
data.description:
Roxe Chain is a hybrid blockchain which is built for global payments. Roxe Chain is
owned by Roxe Chain Foundation (RCF), a fully-decentralized independent
organization, dedicated to creating a decentralized, blockchain-native, global payment
currency.

Its core objective is to establish a simple, and efficient value transfer mechanism. Roxe
Chain intends to bridge the divide between technology and value to achieve an open
connection to existing value systems at a low cost.

Roxe Chain has been under development by the Roxe development team since early
2019, as of December 2020, we have completed more than 300 code upgrades.
We strongly believe that the outdated global payments and clearing value transfer
system will achieve step-change improvements with the application of blockchain
technology.

Roadmap:

Q4 2019
Roxe Instant Settlement Network V1 goes live on Testnet
Supernode collaboration on Testnet started

Q2 2020
Roxe Instant Settlement Network V2 goes live on Testnet
RSS(Roxe Settlement Serivce) V1 goes live
RCP(Roxe Currency Platform) V1 goes live

Q3 2020
Roxe Instant Settlement Network V3 goes live on Testnet
RPP (Roxe Payment Protocol) V1 online
The first partner settlement node completes the access to RSS V1 and RCP V1

Q4 2020
Roxe Instant Settlement Network V1 goes live on Main Net
RSS (Roxe Settlement Service) and RCP (Roxe Currency Platform) V2 iterations go live
Roxe's official website and Blockchain browser V1 goes live
Roxe ID V1 goes live
Roxe decentralized wallet web version V1 goes live
Roxe Pay decentralized wallet V1 is available, supporting Roxe Chain wallet and cross-chain minting redemption function, supportig USD fiat deposit online.
Establishing partnership with settlement nodes, payment nodes, service nodes, etc. in the United States, the United Kingdom, Hong Kong and connecting them to Roxe Network.

Q2 2021
RPP V2 goes live
Roxe ID V2 goes live
Roxe Chain - based lending product V1 goes live
RCP V3, which is based on smart contract custody, goes live, which supports decentralized cross-chain token minting.
Roxe APP V2 goes live with Roxe ID, Pay, Connect and other features.
Establishing partnerships with settlement nodes, payment nodes, service nodes in Mexico, India, Philippines, Nigeria and connecting them to roxe network.

Q4 2021
Subsequent iterations of Roxe Instant Settlement Network and related blockchain products to improve performance and security.
RCP V4. which is based on smart contract custody, goes live, supporting more types of cross-chain token minting.
Roxe official APP V3 goes live, with cross-border remittance, Earn, Lend and other features
Expansion of settlement nodes, payment nodes, service nodes, etc. covering more than 20 countries worldwide to establish cooperation and access to Roxe Network.

Q4 2020
Subsequent iterations of Roxe Instant Settlement Network and related blockchain products, adding new product features.
The number of nodes reaches 50 countries and regions worldwide.

Q4 2024
Subsequent iterations of Roxe Instant Settlement Network and related blockchain products to improve the performance and security of the new products.
